title: Multiplication
descript: Mathematical operation that consists of finding the result of adding a number as many times as indicated by another

title: Multiplication
descript: Mathematical operation that consists of finding the result of adding a number as many times as indicated by another

title: Division
descript: It is the inverse operation of multiplication. Division consists of finding out how many times a number is contained in another one.

title: Division
